customCommands.name: review-scraper
customCommands.prompt: Review the scraper code in scraper_table.py. Check for: 1) Proper error handling, 2) Updated selectors, 3) Efficient waits. Reference @PROJECT_CONTEXT.md for architecture.

customCommands.name: add-field
customCommands.description: Guide to add new scraped field
customCommands.prompt: I want to add a new field to the scraper. Follow the steps in @TASK_TEMPLATES.md under 'Adding a New Scraped Field'. Ask me what field I want to add.

customCommands.name: debug-scraper
customCommands.prompt: Help me debug the scraper. Follow the checklist in @TASK_TEMPLATES.md under 'Debugging Scraper Issues'. First, let me know what errors I'm seeing.
